name: Rainbow Shooter
description:
Rules:

Defeat enemies by shooting them with the right bullet and take down the boss at the end of each level. Each color can only be defeated by a certain other color:

- Red beats Yellow
- Yellow beats Blue
- Blue beats Red
... That applies to you, too. Switch colors to avoid damage!

Controls:
Left Click - Move in direction of mouse
Right Click - Shoot in direction of mouse
X - Change player color
Z - Change bullet color

Credits:
FinalAngel661 - Programming, Sound Effects, Design
ProbablyK - Art, Design
Asc - Programming, Design
GateGuy - Programming, Design

Music Credits:
